column5: Premier five star resort on the island! Diamond Beach is an exciting addition to the coast. It combines upscale onsite amenities within a comfortable family setting. It radiates beauty along with fun and relaxation! If you desire the best in this amazing resort, this luxurious 3 bedroom 2 bath unit is for you. On site: lazy river, gameroom, playroom, waterslide, swim up bar-peak season, ocean and direct beach access, infinity pools, hot tubs, lab, cinema room, and workout room. Come Enjoy!
